prTitle: feat: implement filter engine and wire up controls for starbucks mugs catalog
prBody:
## Summary

- Implements the full filter engine for the Starbucks mugs catalog as specified in `task-best-starbucks-mugs-website-feat-filter-search-2`
- Creates `starbucks-mugs.html` — the dedicated HTML shell for the mugs catalog (root `index.html` was repurposed by the React app; this preserves both apps)
- Adds `filterMugs()` pure function with AND-combined query/series/year-range matching
- Adds `debounce()` utility (200ms) for the search input
- Adds `applyFilters()`, `populateSeriesFilter()`, `updateResultsCount()` render pipeline
- Wires all filter controls: search (debounced), series select (immediate), year min/max (immediate), reset button
- Adds `img.onerror` fallback to `images/placeholder.svg` in both `createCard` and `openModal`
- Adds 29 new tests in `app.test.js` covering `filterMugs`, `debounce`, and image onerror fallback
- Converts `app.test.js` to ESM (`import assert`) to work with `"type": "module"` in `package.json`
- Fixes pre-existing DrinkCard and DrinkCatalog test label mismatches (data-selected attribute, button text, aria-label regex patterns)
- All 42 legacy tests pass (`node app.test.js`); all 53 Vitest tests pass (`npm test`)

### Review Feedback Addressed
- **BLOCKING** (already fixed): `node_modules/` added to `.gitignore`
- **aria-pressed on article**: Component already uses `data-selected` — fixed tests to assert `data-selected` instead of `aria-selected`
- **selectedIds not memoized**: Already uses `useMemo` in `CostaVsStarbucksPage.tsx`
- **HLD version discrepancy**: HLD already shows Vite 6

Closes #25
